record.title: COMMENDING THE MISS AMERICA ORGANIZATION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to S. Res. 68, which was submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: It is late, but everyone should know the Miss America Pageant is in Las Vegas this year.
I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
